section.4: The Book of Ghusl and Tayammum

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Marwan bin Al-Hakam said that one should perform Wudu' after touching one's penis. Marwan said:"Busrah bint Safwan told me that." 'Urwah sent someone to check that, and she said: "The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) mentioned what Wudu' is done for, and said: 'Touching the penis
